meanings.definition: To spend or use (money, time, etc.) unwisely or wastefully.
meanings.sent1: She often misspends her allowance on unnecessary toys.
meanings.sent2: He always misspends his salary on expensive gadgets.
meanings.sent3: The character in the story misspends all his savings on magic beans.
meanings.sent4: Like a leaky bucket, he misspends his resources without a second thought.
meanings.sent5: Her tendency to misspend makes her financial situation precarious.

meanings.definition: To waste or squander (resources, opportunities, etc.) by poor decision-making.
meanings.sent1: The company misspends its budget on ineffective marketing strategies.
meanings.sent2: They constantly misspend their chances to improve their situation.
meanings.sent3: In the game, players can misspend their virtual currency on useless items.
meanings.sent4: He misspends his talents by not pursuing his true passion.
meanings.sent5: The team's coach warned them not to misspend their energy early in the game.
